Class DataFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.comp3111.DataFilter

  • public class DataFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    DataFilter class provides static methods for manipulating dataTable
    Author:
    Henry Chan

      FilterTableByIndex takes a dataTable and desired index to retain and return a dataTable with selected index

      GetTableTextLabels takes a dataTable and return a HashMap with key to be the column name and value to be a set of unique text for each column

      NonRepRandomIntegerGenerator get the start and end(exclusive) and generate an randomly shuffled array of integer in the specified range
      static DataTable[] RandomSplitTable(DataTable dataTable, double splitRatio)
      RandomSplitTable takes in a dataTable and randomly split it into two according to the splitRatio which the exact number of rows for one of the split dataTable is (lowerbound)splitRatio*numRows.

      TextFilter takes the target dataTable and retainValues which is a map of column name and text values for column to retain.

    • Method Detail

      • TextFilter

        public static DataTable TextFilter(DataTable dataTable,
                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> retainValues)
        TextFilter takes the target dataTable and retainValues which is a map of column name and text values for column to retain. The function will return a dataTable with rows containing columns to be retain.
        Parameters:
        dataTable - - the dataTable for processing
        retainValues - - the HashMap contains column name and for each column name, the set of text to be retain
        Returns:
        newDataTable - a dataTable filtered with given retainValues

      • RandomSplitTable

        public static DataTable[] RandomSplitTable(DataTable dataTable,
                                           double splitRatio)
        RandomSplitTable takes in a dataTable and randomly split it into two according to the splitRatio which the exact number of rows for one of the split dataTable is (lowerbound)splitRatio*numRows.
        Parameters:
        dataTable - - the dataTable for processing
        splitRatio - - the splitRatio
        Returns:
        splitedTables - a DataTable array of size 2 containing dataTables which are split with ratio specified in in splitRatio

      • NonRepRandomIntegerGenerator

        public static java.lang.Integer[] NonRepRandomIntegerGenerator(int start,
                                                               int end)
        NonRepRandomIntegerGenerator get the start and end(exclusive) and generate an randomly shuffled array of integer in the specified range
        Parameters:
        start - - start integer (inclusive)
        end - - end integer (exclusive)
        Returns:
        randomIntegerArray - randomly shuffled integer array with specified range

      • FilterTableByIndex

        public static DataTable FilterTableByIndex(DataTable dataTable,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> index)
        FilterTableByIndex takes a dataTable and desired index to retain and return a dataTable with selected index
        Parameters:
        dataTable - - the input dataTable
        index - - the index array with indexes of rows wanted to retain
        Returns:
        newDataTable - table filtered with given index

      • GetTableTextLabels

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> GetTableTextLabels(DataTable dataTable)
        GetTableTextLabels takes a dataTable and return a HashMap with key to be the column name and value to be a set of unique text for each column
        Parameters:
        dataTable - - the input dataTable
        Returns:
        textLabelTable - HashMap with column name as key and sets of unique text for each column
